text: Napiye! Nampikkaiyalarkalai porukkut (tayarakumpatit) tuntuviraka. Unkalil porumaiyum, cakipputtanmaiyum utaiya irupatu perkal iruntal irunuru perkalai verri kolvarkal. Unkalil (attakaiya) nuru perkal iruntal nirakarippavarkalil ayiram perai verri kolvarkal. (Ninkal mikak kuraivaka iruntum avarkalai tunivutan etirkkalam enru kuriyatu, unkalukku allah puriyum utaviyai). Niccayamaka avarkal ariyata makkalaka iruppatutan itarkuk karanamakum
